A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Total Disney garbage. Doesn't add anything to the star wars lore. No interesting character twists. Po and Finn stories are dull and pointless. All the fan theories about Rey and Kylo are far more interesting than what actually happened. This is the marvel-ification of film. Crappy story. Awful villains. No depth whatsoever. Just crappy chase scenes and explosions.
